sentence.Network_en: Scientists are becoming increasingly unsure of the validity of this technique.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家们越来越拿不准这一技术是否正当合法。

sentence.Network_en: The criticisms have at least an element of truth and validity.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些批评至少有一丝真实性和合理性。

sentence.Network_en: The period of validity of the agreement has expired.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 效度(validITy)：指测试过程能测出所欲测试特性的程度(目标之贡献)。信度(reliabilITy)：指测试之稳定性(公算或机率)。
公司部门英文缩写简称大全(1) - Lixy - 博客园 ... 标准化:( standardization) 有效性:( validity) 客观性:( objectivity).
第三人称 - dsen0110 - 网易博客 ... valid a. 有根据的，正确的，有效的 validity n. 正确性，有效(性)，合法性 valley n. 山谷，溪谷.

entry.def: The validity of something such as a result or a piece of information is whether it can be trusted or believed.

example.ex: Shocked by the results of the elections, they now want to challenge the validity of the vote...
example.tran: 选举结果令他们很震惊，他们现在要对选举的可信性提出质疑。

example.ex: Some people, of course, denied the validity of any such claim.
example.tran: 当然，一些人否定了此类说法的合理性。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being logically valid
2. the quality of having legal force or effectiveness

auth_sentence.content: Random phone checks confirmed the validity of the consent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Random phone checks confirmed the validity of the consent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Random phone checks confirmed the validity of the consent.

auth_sentence.content: There is no validity or truth to any religion.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no validity or truth to any religion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no validity or truth to any religion.

auth_sentence.content: Does non-scientific evidence have equal validity to scientific evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Does non-scientific evidence have equal validity to scientific evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does non-scientific evidence have equal validity to scientific evidence.

stems_affixes.word_buile: equi+val价值+ent……的,也表示物→同等价值
equi平等+val价值+ence表名词→同等价值

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效性, 合法性, 正确性
stems_affixes.word_buile: valid[adj.有效的, 有根据的,正确的]+ity表名词→n.有效性, 合法性, 正确性
con全部+val强壮+escence开始……→全身开始强壮起来→恢复健康
equi+val价值+ent……的,也表示物→同等价值
val强壮+or表名词→n.英勇, 勇猛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使有效, 使生效, 确认, 证实, 验证
stems_affixes.word_buile: valid[adj.有效的, 有根据的,正确的]+ate使……→v.使有效, 使生效, 确认, 证实, 验证

Sentence.sentence: People who do not have access to a good listener may not only be denied the opportunity to heighten their self-awareness, but they are also denied valuable feedback as to the validity and acceptability of their inner thoughts and feelings.

means.word_mean: 有效;效力;合法性; （正式的）认可

sentences.en: The tests have been shown to be of dubious validity.
sentences.cn: 这些试验的有效性已显得令人怀疑。

means.word_mean: 正当;正确;确实; 符合逻辑

sentences.en: I would question the validity of that assumption.
sentences.cn: 我会质疑那个假设的正当性。
